body.name: Kigai Christmas Deer Kids Water Bottle, BPA-Free Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw Lid Double Walled Leakproof Flask for Girls Boys Toddlers, 12Oz
features: 【MATERIAL】Our vacuum leakproof flask is made of food grade 304 stainless steel material + food grade PP+ food grade silicone, Does not transfer flavor, ensuring absolute safety, adults and children can use it with confidence.
【VACUUM INSULATED】Our Kids insulated water bottle can keep liquids cold or hot for longer, Double walled design can prevent condensation from forming on the outside, Keep the bottle dry.

【LIGHTWEIGHT&CONVENIENT】7.7 x 2.8 inches. This lightweight kettle can hold 350ml/12oz of water and can be placed in a bag, car cup holders and bike cages, without taking up too much space. Great for adults and children travel picnic hiking school use.

【BOTTLE CAPAND&STRAW DESIGN】This children water bottle with pop-up straw, safe and resistant to high temperature and no deformation for easy to drink, clean and hygieni, with a spill-proof valve that prevent water from squirting out, the straw lid attached with a handle for easy bring around.

【NICE GIFT】This stylish leak-proof tumbler lightweight, easy to carry, so you can always hydrate, is the perfect choice for children to school, picnics, shopping, very suitable as Christmas, Thanksgiving, baby shower gifts.
body.description: Kigai stainless steel double insulation cup, warm your every day, take care of your travel Details: Size: 7.7 x 2.8 inches Material: stainless steel Pattern: Single-sided printing design Thoughtful Design: Bottle cap with a handle, easy to carry, internal double structure, good insulation, with a plastic straw, easy to drink. This children's water bottle with a pop-up straw, press the button, the cap can be popped open, with leak-proof and spill-proof design, safe and efficient, easy to drink. The water bottle for kids students and office workers, the beach, gymnasium, cycling, swimming fitness outside picnics, etc., convenient and practical. Instructions: Minors should use it under the guidance of an adult or after reporting. Clean the inside and outside of the cup with neutral detergent in warm water Before use. In order to achieve the best effect of keeping the cup hot and cold it is recommended to add hot water or ice water for preheating or pre-cooling. Attention: When adding boiling water to the cup it should not be too full to prevent scalds from overflowing Avoid direct heating or placing in high temperature Holding Time: 10 hours above 45℃, 6 hours above 65℃ Good Server: Our shop mainly sells a variety of exquisite home furnishings Carefully design each product from the perspective of customer needs High quality and caring service are the pursuit of our store so that customers can buy comfortably and use them at ease You can contact us if you have any product questions We devote to provide the best customer service
